name: Pferd & Pony: Mein Pferdehof & Lass Uns Reiten 2
overview: Lass uns reiten 2 is a kids-compatible riding and horse keeping simulation where all the game play elements are embedded into a story line of a young girl trying to convince her father of her being able to raise and take good care of a horse. Mein Pferdehof is a horse management simulator, the game being centred around an office, a stable, some fields and a small house. The player will bathe, groom, pet, feed, saddle and finally race horses. There are also several ways that can be used to make money. You can rent out a guest house, advertise your stables, buy and sell land and race professionally.
